beer.beer_description:
In our Britpop Modern English IPA, we take a US
IPA and start a revolution in your head. Traditional English malts and an English yeast strain lend a backbone as smooth as suede, then we a Blur of assertive, fruit-forward UK hops to create a truly unique brew.
Confidenceis a preforence, and we choose tis uncommon IPA for uncommon people.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.checkin_comment: Genuinely excellent. A lovely, well-formed IPA built on earthy English hops, which gives hints of tea and snapped green wood. Mild, smooth bitterness brings it home.
